title: "Takydromus sexlineatus"

Common name; Asian grass lizard  
*Takydromus sexlineatus* are found widely throughout South East Asia such as China, Thailand and Indonesia.

They have the longest relative tail of any lizards, measuring more than three times longer than the snout-vent length.  
(Uetz et al., 2019)
